attributes.action: award an OBE to MARGARET HUMPHREYS who started the Child Migrants Trust.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am so proud of the work and endless campaigning by Margaret Humphreys who uncovered and helped the victims of a terrible wrong by the British Government.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
